pages.text: You pondered a lot about how it can be possible to create this actually mundane color. You needed a way to darken the orange tone you had already created.$(br)And then it occurred to you. It's so logical when you think about it! The three gems you found correspond to the three basic colors of color theory!$(br)By mixing all three colors you can create a shard that is so dark it almost looks unreal.
The creation of this 'blackest of blacks' has to be performed in a way that absolutely no unregulated light can pollute the crystal. So midnight on a full moon it is. Best to bing a clock with you.
